alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Coryell; Ellis; Hamilton; Hill; Johnson; McLennan; Somervell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 21 at 5:57PM CDT until March 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Somervell County in north central Texas... East central Hamilton County in central Texas... Northwestern McLennan County in central Texas... Central Coryell County in central Texas... Johnson County in north central Texas... Bosque County in central Texas... Western Hill County in central Texas... Northwestern Ellis County in north central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 557 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Meridian, or 12 miles northwest of Clifton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waco, Mansfield, Burleson, Cleburne, Midlothian, Gatesville, Crowley, Hillsboro, Woodway, Lacy-Lakeview, Keene, Joshua, McGregor, Alvarado, Clifton, Rendon, Venus, Glen Rose, Whitney and Itasca. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 361 and 369. Interstate 35W between mile markers 1 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Bosque; Coryell; Ellis; Hamilton; Hill; Johnson; McLennan; Somervell
